entry.title: Vim with python support
entry.content:
I beat around the bush with my raspberrypi on raspbian trying to get python support in vim, almost got to compiling vim from source, but it gave me the chance to learn something new.

  • If you want to check if vim has support for python then use the has() function i.e :echo has('python')
  • To install vim with python install vim-nox or get a suggestion from the package manager when you try to install vim-python.
  • To compile a debian package from source, check this debian forum link.
